articles.author: Jack Detsch
articles.title: Taiwan’s former president says Ukraine needs US weapons more urgently than Taipei - POLITICO
articles.description: Tsai Ing-wen’s comments come after a top U.S. military leader said supplying U.S. weapons to Kyiv was cutting into stockpiles that could be used in a war in Asia.
articles.content: Up to this year, where most of the employment of weapons were really artillery pieces and short-range weapons, I had said: Not at all, Paparo said at the Brookings Institution think tank earlier this… [+2054 chars]
